location: Joint Base Pearl Harbor Hickam, Hawaii, United States
summary: Knowledgeable Engineering Superintendent well-versed in supporting projects and managing related documentation. First-rate multitasker, problem-solver and organizer with methodical and thorough approach. Proficient in PowerPoint and Word Documents.

experience.title: Engineering Assistant
experience.description: Supports twelve ships in the waterfront, provides technical expertise to visiting ships, trains over 60 personnel in problem solving, management and equipment repairs; responsible for maintenance and training for homeported surface ships at JBPHH, Hawaii; provides administrative support to sailors' families.

experience.title: Electrical Superintendent
experience.description: Oversaw master project scheduling and plans for electrical installations; provided leadership to ensure quality and safety; mentored I&E supervisors and contract personnel; developed look-ahead schedules; ensured compliance with local and state codes.

experience.title: Engineering Assistant
experience.description: Led electrical crew scheduling and coordination; supervised lower-level electricians; followed electrical codes; tested installations for circuit continuity, compatibility and safety; coordinated maintenance schedules.

experience.title: Electrical Apprentice
experience.description: Apprentice performing electrical tasks under supervision; followed electrical and building codes; built controllers and panels; tested wiring and systems for faults; maintained safety and organization.

certifications: Marine Maintenance And Ship Repair 3-M System Coordinator/Inspector
